text: was a Japanese businessman, politician and diplomat. He served as the Prime Minister of Japan from 11 June 1924 to 28 January 1926.Nussbaum, Louis- Frédéric. (2005). "Katō Takaaki" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 492. ==Honors== * Order of the Sacred Treasure, Grand Cordon "Treaty between Canada and Japan," (1907). Acts of the Parliament of the Dominion of Canada, p. 348. * Order of St Michael and St George, Knight Grand Cross (GCMG)London Gazette, Issue 27913, p. 3324, May 15, 1906 ; retrieved 2012-9-20. ==References == == Other websites == * Chisholm, Hugh, ed. (1911). "Kato, Taka-Akira". Encyclopædia Britannica (11th ed.).
